dc_title_s: Map of the lower portion of the Mahoning River Basin showing availability of underground water
dc_description_s: Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.|Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the lower Mahoning River Basin and quality of underground water.|"Prepared by JAMES W. CUMMINS, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water"|Scale bar lower right corner of map.
